cyberarkpas.audit.raw:
<syslog>
  <audit_record>
    <Rfc5424>no</Rfc5424>
    <Vendor>Cyber-Ark</Vendor>
    <Product>Vault</Product>
    <Version>11.6.0000</Version>
    <MessageID>31</MessageID>
    <Desc>CPM Reconcile Password</Desc>
    <Severity>Info</Severity>
    <Issuer>PasswordManager</Issuer>
    <Action>CPM Reconcile Password</Action>
    <SourceUser></SourceUser>
    <TargetUser></TargetUser>
    <Safe>Windows</Safe>
    <File>Root\Operating System-WIN-SERVER-LOCAL-dbserver.cyberark.local-Administrator2</File>
    <Station>10.2.0.4</Station>
    <Location></Location>
    <Category></Category>
    <RequestId></RequestId>
    <Reason>ImmediateTask</Reason>
    <ExtraDetails>address=dbserver.cyberark.local;username=Administrator2;</ExtraDetails>
    <Message>CPM Reconcile Password</Message>
    <GatewayStation></GatewayStation>
    <CAProperties>
      <CAProperty Name="PolicyID" Value="WIN-SERVER-LOCAL"></CAProperty>
      <CAProperty Name="UserName" Value="Administrator2"></CAProperty>
      <CAProperty Name="Address" Value="dbserver.cyberark.local"></CAProperty>
      <CAProperty Name="DeviceType" Value="Operating System"></CAProperty>
      <CAProperty Name="LogonDomain" Value="DBServer"></CAProperty>
      <CAProperty Name="SequenceID" Value="1"></CAProperty>
      <CAProperty Name="RetriesCount" Value="-1"></CAProperty>
      <CAProperty Name="LastTask" Value="ReconcileTask"></CAProperty>
      <CAProperty Name="CPMStatus" Value="success"></CAProperty>
      <CAProperty Name="CreationMethod" Value="PVWA"></CAProperty>
      <CAProperty Name="LastSuccessReconciliation" Value="1604944215"></CAProperty>
      <CAProperty Name="Customer" Value="EvilCorp"></CAProperty>
    </CAProperties>
  </audit_record>
</syslog>
